MAST.recipe.recipeplan module¶

class MAST.recipe.recipeplan.RecipePlan(name, working_directory)[source]¶

Contains the entire recipe plan. Attributes:

self.name <str>: Recipe name self.ingredients <dict>: Dictionary of ingredients

and their statuses
self.update_methods <dict>: Dictionary of each
ingredient’s update method, per child [ingredient][child] = update method for child
self.parents_to_check <dict>: Dictionary of parents
to check for completion before each ingredient may be run
self.run_methods <dict>: Dictionary of ingredient
run methods
self.write_methods <dict>: Dictionary of ingredient
write methods
self.ready_methods <dict>: Dictionary of ingredient
ready methods
self.complete_methods <dict>: Dictionary of ingred.
complete methods
self.ingred_input_options <dict>: Dictionary of
ingredient input options

self.status <str>: Recipe status self.working_directory <str>: Recipe working directory self.logger <logging logger>: MAST Monitor logger self.recipe_logger <logging logger>: Recipe-directory logger

add_ingredient(ingredient_name, ingredient)[source]¶

Used to add an ingredient_object corresponding to an ingredient name

check_if_have_parents()[source]¶

Check if runs at “Initialized” status have parents and switch them to “Wait” if so; otherwise, switch them to “Stage”

check_if_parents_are_complete()[source]¶

Check if parents of waiting ingredients are complete.

check_if_ready_to_proceed_are_complete()[source]¶

Check if ready-to-proceed ingredients are complete

check_recipe_status(verbose=1)[source]¶

Check ingredient statuses, and get recipe status I = Initialized W = Waiting on parents S = Staged P = ready to Proceed C = Complete

complete_ingredient(iname)[source]¶

Check if an ingredient is complete

fast_forward_check_complete()[source]¶

Check if runs are complete.

get_ingredient(ingredient_name)[source]¶

Used to get an ingredient_object corresponding to an ingredient name

get_statuses_from_file()[source]¶

Get status of each ingredient from a status.txt file in the recipe directory.

ingredient_iterator()[source]¶

Iterates through the ingredients dict and returns the ingredients one by one

print_status(verbose=1)[source]¶

Print status and set the recipe status.

ready_ingredient(iname)[source]¶

Check if an ingredient is ready

run_ingredient(iname)[source]¶

Run ingredient

run_staged_ingredients()[source]¶

Run staged ingredients.

status_change_recommended(iname)[source]¶

Check if a status change is recommended for the ingredient, as listed in the ingredient folder/change_status.txt. Args:

iname <str>: ingredient name
Returns:
True if a status change was recommended, and
changes the status of the ingredient in self.ingredients.

False otherwise

update_children(iname)[source]¶

Update the children of an ingredient

write_ingredient(iname)[source]¶

Write the ingredient files according to the correct method
